dcterms:creator: Diederik P Kingma
Max Welling
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training samples and 10,000 test samples of handwritten digits, distributed over 10 classes. The specified component is the class identity, while unspecified factors include digit slant, stroke width, etc.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Attila Szab√≥
Qiyang Hu
Tiziano Portenier
Matthias Zwicker
Paolo Favaro
dcterms:description: The MultiPIE dataset consists of face images captured under varying conditions, including different poses and expressions. In this study, a subset of 25 identities for training and 5 identities for testing, each with 3300 images, is used. The specified component is identity, while unspecified factors include pose and expression.
dcterms:title: MultiPIE

dcterms:creator: Michael F Mathieu
Junbo Jake Zhao
Aditya Ramesh
Pablo Sprechmann
Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: The 3D chairs dataset consists of images of different chair models captured from various viewpoints. In this study, a subset of 30 models is selected for evaluation.
dcterms:title: 3D chairs
